nodes.text: Ivok was a Zabrak male who worked as a bioanalyst during the Cold War and Galactic War. As a bioanalyst and a doctor, Ivok worked aboard Carrick Station, where he kept a small shop. There, he bought and sold valuable plants and medicines.
Doctor Ivok appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Bioanalysis crew skill trainer aboard Carrick Station
